div.h3: WE ENVISION EVERY STUDENT THINKING, LEARNING, ACHIEVING , AND CARING

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: Colorado Governor Jared Polis has extended the executive order suspending in-person learning in public and private schools for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Dolores County School District will be providing grab and go meals for students during the governor’s school closure order. Meals will be ready for pickup from 11:30 a.m - 12:30 p.m. daily in the student drop-off lane at the elementary school. This order form will need to be completed weekly. Orders for the following week must be submitted by midnight Sunday.

YOU MUST COMPLETE THE SURVEY IN THE ATTACHED LINK TO ORDER SCHOOL LUNCHES FOR THE REST OF THIS WEEK (MARCH 31-APRIL 2) AND IT NEEDS TO BE SUBMITTED BY MIDNIGHT MARCH 30, 2020. NO OTHER LISTS WILL BE USED FROM THIS POINT FORWARD.
